/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc  -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/backgroundupdateplugin.dir/src/BackgroundUpdateImpl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/backgroundupdateplugin.dir/src/median_gpu.cu.o CMakeFiles/backgroundupdateplugin.dir/src/median_vpi.cpp.o CMakeFiles/backgroundupdateplugin.dir/src/utils.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/backgroundupdateplugin.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/opt/nvidia/deepstream/deepstream/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lnvdsgst_helper -lnvdsgst_meta -lnvds_meta -lnvds_infer -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4//targets/x86_64-linux/lib -lcudart -lgstreamer-1.0 -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -lgstbase-1.0  -lpthread -lnvbufsurface -lnvbufsurftransform -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -ldl
